.\sobol.exe 4096 16 direction_numbers.txt sobol_16d.txt

Powershell command: 
o) cd "C:\Users\mussi\Documents\Manhattan\Leuven\MCQMC\Git_repos\qmc-generators\cpp"
i) g++ -std=c++11 -O3 digitalseq_b2g.cpp -o digitalseq_b2g.exe
ii) .\digitalseq_b2g.exe 15 12 ..\DIGSEQ\nxmats\nxs32m32.col > "C:\Users\mussi\Documents\Manhattan\Leuven\MCQMC\Data_Libraries\Pts\nx_15d_4096.csv"


Harase's Powershell command:
cd "C:\Users\mussi\Documents\Manhattan\Leuven\MCQMC\Data_Libraries\Pts"
gcc -O3 "1.WCUD_Harese.c" -o WCUD_Harese.exe
.\1.WCUD_Harese.exe 10 > tausworthe_10d.txt



GIT COMANDS:
Given the github repository: gh repo clone jointpoints/tms-nets then write in the gitshell git clone https://github.com/jointpoints/tms-nets.git


Quick Link Github Repositories:
https://github.com/stefanocartabia/MCQMC
